translations: 投赞成票者（ay的复数, ay等于aye）

sentences.sentence: He is al ays asking such silly questions.
sentences.translation: 他老是提这类愚蠢的问题。

sentences.sentence: When he speaks, he is al ays making some gestures.
sentences.translation: 当他讲话时，他总是做些手势。

sentences.sentence: He as not serious at all. He as al ays smiling at each of us.
sentences.translation: 他一点也不严肃，一直对我们每个人微笑。
